sense.name: answer or respond to something in words or action
sense.examples: "Where are you going?" I asked. "Home," he replied. I replied that it was 12 o'clock. I try to reply to letters the day I receive them. She replied to the threats by going to the police. Lucy replied with a kick to the guard's shins. He replied not guilty to each charge as it was put to him by the court clerk.
